definition: of or relating to different levels in a hierarchy (as levels of social class or income group), a vertical structural member as a post or stake
details:
adjective
- of or relating to different levels in a hierarchy (as levels of social class or income group)
= example: of or relating to different levels in a hierarchy (as levels of social class or income group)
- at right angles to the plane of the horizon or a base line
= example: at right angles to the plane of the horizon or a base line
= synonyms: perpendicular
- upright in position or posture
= synonyms: erect
- relating to or involving all stages of a business from production to distribution
noun
- a vertical structural member as a post or stake
= synonyms: upright
- something that is oriented vertically
